channel.description:

If u want msg me :jizz:

item.title: Coop
item.dc:creator: Tebe
item.description:
Grey Acumen:

Where the heck did you find decent coop mods for Opposing Force and Blue Shift? I know Sven coop handled HL1, and was working on including Opposing Force, but last I heard it hadn’t ever gotten around to ACTUALLY including it. And Blue Shift coop mod that I know about is full of bugs.

https://www.moddb.com/mods/opposing-force-coop

Dunno about decency tho. But I guess it’s not worse than Sven Coops HL…

Read full topic
